section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: LFG is a business association representing some 50 Swedish manufacturers of body and trailer add-ons and components. LFG represent all types structures, from timber trailers, containers and dumper platforms to cranes and tankers.
industry_forums: LFG participates via CLCCR in a number of technical working groups of the European Commission (DG Grow; MVWG; DG MOVE; Road worthiness; DG ClIMA; Co2 reduction an monitoring)
relevant_communication: LFG participates via CLCCR in a number of technical working groups of the European Commission (DG Grow; MVWG; DG MOVE; Road worthiness; DG ClIMA; Co2 reduction an monitoring) and in the working groups GRRF, GRSG, GRE, ADR, TIR and ATP of the United Nations in Geneva.
